full_description:
The Job:

Location: Remote |California | Hawaii | Illinois | New York | Colorado | Massachusetts | Washington

We are looking for a Content Developer â€“ Undergraduate Education to join a team building the next generation of a growing education technology platform. We are looking for Content Developers who are subject matter experts in biology, chemistry, physics, and behavioral sciences (psychology & sociology). Accreditation and deep experience in the education field (including experience with e-learning tools) is preferred, but what we want most of all is someone who is ready to push for excellent, genuinely innovative resources and perspectives on this material. This is a part-time to full time opportunity.

What you will do:

Determine the curriculum of Sketchy undergrad products, including which topics to cover and their priority, order, and emphasis within the product
Learn and execute the steps of content creation, including outlining, scripting, and review of instructional assets and authoring & editing of practice items
Exert strong general ownership over the instructional experience of Sketchy products built in your area(s) of expertise
Ensure accuracy of instructional & assessment materials
Collaborate with other teams, such as art, technology, and video production to drive assets and products to completion
Advocate for student needs, based on customer knowledge gained through personal experience and/or user research
Adjust content and operations in response to metrics and user feedback
Ad-hoc projects

What you bring to the role:

2+ years experience in teaching or education, interacting directly with learners and/or creating instructional materials or curricula
Degree or equivalent experience in at least one of the following subject-matter areas:
Biology
Chemistry
Organic chemistry
Physics
Behavioral sciences (psychology & sociology)
Training or experience in multiple subjects preferred
Experience in test prep (e.g., MCAT) and test-taking strategies preferred, but not strictly necessary
Experience in creative content production (e.g. digital platforms, e-learning, instructional design) preferred
Ability to learn new techniques, skills, and tools on the job
Comfort with collaboration in a remote-workforce environment
Eager attitude for working with cool people to make awesome new things

What We Offer

Competitive compensation plan
Innovative, high growth and collaborative culture.
Generous PTO package with floating holidays
Fun team events (Monthly and virtual for now)
Great Benefits including: Medical, dental, vision, life 401k and more!

SketchyGroup LLC is an Equal Opportunity Employer.
